ygData.subject: Re: Lambent bits and pieces
ygData.msgSnippet: I tried once with the invis song but we also had a wizard who originally had cast invis on the whole party. Neither worked. ... -- Artificial Intelligence
ygData.messageBody:
I tried once with the invis song but we also had a wizard who originally
had cast invis on the whole party. Neither worked.

On Thu, Feb 10/00, Lonnie Lewis <LLewis@...> wrote:
> From: Lonnie Lewis <LLewis@...>
>
> were you doing the invis?
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: jhenders@... [SMTP:jhenders@...]
> > Sent: Thursday, February 10, 2000 2:30 PM
> > To: eqbards@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [eqbards] Lambent bits and pieces
> >
> > From: jhenders@...
> >
> > On Thu, Feb 10/00, John Tatsukawa <jht@...> wrote:
> > >
> > > Strange. Then why don't they aggro on other invis level 30's that I've
> > > travelled with. They're always baffled as to why these things aggro on
> > me
> > > and not them, or is this just a hate thing? *shrug*
> > >
> > > I'm a level 28 half-elf bard.
> >
> > I had the exact thing happen at L35 with my bard. 4 of us in Sol A.
> > Everyone invis's up and heads in. Every time, a goblin agro'd on me. I
> > tried twice walking behind everyone else and it always happened.
> > Everyone else would pass the goblin that attacked me.
> >
> >
> >
> > --
> > Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
